name: prompttools (hegelai)
description: [项目级] Open-source tools for prompt testing and experimentation, with support for both LLMs (e.g. OpenAI, LLaMA) and vector databases (e.g. Chroma, Weaviate, LanceDB).。来源: https://github.com/hegelai/prompttools

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Open-source tools for prompt testing and experimentation, with support for both LLMs (e.g. OpenAI, LLaMA) and vector databases (e.g. Chroma, Weaviate, LanceDB).

来源: https://github.com/hegelai/prompttools
语言: Python
Stars: 3012

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE

docs

docs/source
examples

examples/prompttests
img
img/demo.gif
img/feedback.png

img/hegel_ai_logo_dark.svg
img/playground.gif
img/prompttest.png

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
We will be delighted to work with early adopters to shape our designs. Please reach out to us [via email](mailto:team@hegel-ai.com) if you're
interested in using this tooling for your project or have any feedback.
